title: Typical Riot
body:
be riot
release challenger ahri
ok cool skin
remove dfg
ok at least ahri buffs
remove ahri charm effect
ok

Rip in pieces Ahri.

replies.body:
But man, have you seen the new AP ratios? She's much better late game now, so much so that she doesn't need DFG to do the same damage. Remember, Charm now deals most of its damage in form of its on-hit point, not in its 20% bonus damage.

I don't like that movement speed buff on Q though. I see it as a nerf, because the Orb returns to Ahri quicker now.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KwyEvWj6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-29T23:02:35.769+0000)
> I don't like that movement speed buff on Q though. I see it as a nerf, because the Orb returns to Ahri quicker now.

I have to say, I haven't noticed that...
Not the orb itself, but say, if you're running toward your orb and you throw it out, it stays out for a shorter amount of time because it has less distance to travel.
Ahri can still be successful and a massive mid/late game thread, she just takes skill now.
